channel.title: Fishing and wcing rares :p
channel.description:
yeah i'm gonna see if it's possible :p i'm thinkin, if u can mine it, why not wc or fish it? my problem is this for wc: finding where cutting a tree gives logs if some1 knows what code that is(client.java) fishing: same deal example would be sometin like dis when mine copper addItem(id for copper) somtin like dat i need somtin like dis if (id for harpoon) is used with (id for fishing spot) additem (shark id)
if possible, thx

item.title: Fishing and wcing rares :p
item.dc:creator: @Mmmm_Java Mmmm Java
item.description:
@Mmmm_Java wrote:

well, if your game has woodcutting there will be something in your client.java that looks something like this addItem(1519, 1); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[8]), 8); sendMessage("You get some willow logs."); actionTimer = 140; actionTimer =- playerLevel[8];
or for fishing addItem(fishing[4], 1); addSkillXP((fishing[2] * fishing[3]), playerFishing); sendMessage("You catch a "+GetItemName(fishing[4])+".");
all im sayin is to change the additem with an item of your own… my code is from testscape btw

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing and wcing rares :p
item.dc:creator: @Mmmm_Java Mmmm Java
item.description:
@Mmmm_Java wrote:

here are the codes for adding different logs just search for these and change the item to some rare

regular:

addItem(1511, 1);

oak:

addItem(1521, 1);

willow:

addItem(1519, 1);

maple:

addItem(1517, 1);

yews:

addItem(1515, 1);

magic:

addItem(1513, 1);

just change it to something like this (1044 is green phat):

addItem(1044, 1);

Read full topic
